About Us and Our Team

ABOUT US

Pushing, Promoting, and Delivering Innovation

Our team embodies the spirit of innovation, which is evident every time you see our technology. Our solutions are being recognized by companies like HPE and Nvidia as best being able to adapt and handle the most demanding workloads. Our team continues to push, promote and deliver new innovation for DDC that AI, deep learning, and HPC customers will benefit from now and in the future.

Request a Quote

OUR TEAM… DESIGNED TO BE AN EXTENSION OF YOURS.

01

Our Products

Our portfolio of products is designed to solve the density, efficiency, and cooling challenges presented by high-performance compute applications as well as extend the data center beyond four walls.

02

Global Reach

Having successfully demonstrated the capabilities of the DDC platform in ScaleMatrix’ data centers across the U.S., the DDC team is now making this revolutionary platform available to enterprise clients and service providers alike, to deliver high-density, efficient data center services in any location across the globe.

MEET OUR TEAM

Our team embodies the spirit of innovation, which is evident every time you see the cabinet technology of DDC. Recognized as the recipient of the Most Innovative Solution at the Leverage Big Data/Enterprise HPC Summit, our team continues to push, promote and deliver new innovation for DDC that AI, deep learning, and HPC customers will benefit from now and in the future.
